Package api

Class DWGraph_DS

java.lang.Object
api.DWGraph_DS
All Implemented Interfaces:
directed_weighted_graph, java.io.Serializable
public class DWGraph_DS
extends java.lang.Object
implements directed_weighted_graph, java.io.Serializable
This interface represents a directional weighted graph. The interface has a road-system or communication network in mind - support a large number of nodes (over 100,000).
See Also:
Serialized Form

      public void connect​(int src, int dest, double w)

      Specified by:
      connect in interface directed_weighted_graph
      Parameters:
      src - - the source of the edge.
      dest - - the destination of the edge.
      w - - positive weight representing the cost (aka time, price, etc) between src-->dest.

      public java.util.Collection<node_data> getV​(int node_id)
